Class ReservationData

java.lang.Object
main.ReservationData
public class ReservationData extends Object
The ReservationData class provides CRUD operations for managing reservations in the database. It includes methods to create, update, delete, and retrieve reservation records.

  • Method Details

    • addRes

      public void addRes(Reservation res)
      Adds a new reservation to the database.
      Parameters:
      res - the Reservation object containing the details of the reservation to be added.

    • delRes

      public void delRes(int resID)
      Deletes a reservation from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      resID - the ID of the reservation to delete.

    • updateRes

      public void updateRes(Reservation res)
      Updates an existing reservation in the database.
      Parameters:
      res - the Reservation object containing the updated reservation details.

    • getRes

      public Reservation getRes(int resID)
      Retrieves a reservation from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      resID - the ID of the reservation to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Reservation object, or null if not found.

    • listAllRes

      public List<Reservation> listAllRes()
      Retrieves all reservations from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of Reservation objects containing all reservation records.
